ace-pattern-documentation.description: ACE pattern documentation system using YAML frontmatter and markdown for structured pattern metadata
evidence: YAML frontmatter with pattern metadata (pattern_id, name, domain, language, type, confidence, observations)
patterns: Markdown sections: Overview, Description, Statistics, Pattern ID, When to Use, Related Patterns
Auto-generated documentation footer with research paper attribution

ace-offline-training.description: Multi-epoch offline training system for iterative pattern discovery and refinement based on research paper specifications
evidence: Multi-epoch offline training system for ACE pattern discovery
implementing research paper specifications for iterative pattern refinement
patterns: Batch reflect via agent invocation pattern

pattern-evolution-tracking.description: Time-series tracking of pattern metadata with creation timestamps, updates, and observation counts
evidence: First Seen / Last Updated timestamps in markdown

living-documentation.description: Auto-generated documentation that evolves with system state, tracking real-world usage metrics

confidence-based-learning.description: Statistical learning system using success/failure observations to calculate confidence scores

research-driven-development.description: Implementation patterns derived from academic research papers with explicit citations

structured-metadata.description: YAML frontmatter combined with markdown for machine-readable and human-readable documentation

evidence-based-confidence.description: Calculate trust scores based on empirical observations rather than subjective assessment

machine-and-human-readable.description: Design documentation formats that serve both automated systems and human developers

temporal-provenance.description: Track when data was created and modified to understand evolution over time

academic-rigor.description: Ground implementation decisions in peer-reviewed research with explicit citations

incremental-refinement.description: Improve patterns iteratively through multiple epochs rather than one-shot optimization

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from YAML frontmatter, markdown structure, and content analysis
